alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Greer; Harmon; Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 17 at 7:41PM CDT until May 17 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Roger Mills County in western Oklahoma... Northwestern Harmon County in southwestern Oklahoma... Northwestern Greer County in southwestern Oklahoma... Beckham County in western Oklahoma... * Until 830 PM CDT. * At 741 PM CDT, a cluster of severe thunderstorms were located from 4 miles southwest of Sweetwater to 4 miles northwest of Erick to 6 miles north of Vinson, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Elk City, Sayre, Cheyenne, Erick, Carter, Willow, Sweetwater, Strong City, Texola, Delhi, Brinkman, Berlin and Dempsey. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
